Instance Method# setImage(_:at:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.15+**macOS**



```
@MainActor
func setImage(
    _ image: NSImage?,
    at index: Int
)
```

**Mac Catalyst**



```
@MainActor

    _ image: UIImage?,

)
```
